Enhanced with Triple Odor Defense technology providing a shield against odor from heat, motion and stress, expertly formulated for ultra-powerful 48 hour odor control. Goes on invisible, leaving no white residue on skin. Specifically designed for men, our sleek, portable grooming kit includes stainless steel tools crafted for strength and durability. Includes safety scissors, a nail clipper, slant-head tweezers, and a nail file that also pushes back cuticles. Specifically designed for men, this tweezer has a larger grip for guys' comfort. The perfectly aligned, ultra-precise slanted tips grab stubby regrowth and even the tiniest hairs. Specifically designed for men, this powerful men's grooming tool clips even tough fingernails and toenails in one effortless squeeze. The curved jaws open wide and have ultrafine pointed tips, making it easy to get under the corners of nails. reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Overall good product, pretty strong in smell and it holds up a decent amount of hours.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Mitchum.. there's a reason they don't bother advertising.
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Mitchum deodorant since sometime in the 1970's. It is hands down the absolute best antiperspirant/deodorant. Particularly great for camping, when daily showers are not always available - you will smell the rest of yourself before you smell your underarms lol. 3 days of protection if you're not in terribly hot weather or swimming. I use the roll-on, this solid is my son's preference. The only negative I have is that the 'unscented', which for many years really was unscented, has been altered to .. a lightly scented 'unscented'. Solid, roll-on - it doesn't seem to matter which - unscented is no longer actually unscented. However, this is the best, most reliable deodorant out there. You never see commercials for Mitchum because, they don't need to advertise. Loyal customers and word of mouth is all they need. Yes, it's that good. Do yourself a favor and try it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Dependable Protection That Gets the Job Done!
reviews.reviewText: Mitchum Men's Deodorant, the Antiperspirant Stick with Triple Odor Defense, is my go-to choice for reliable protection against body odor. While I'm not particularly fond of the smell, the results it delivers make it a small compromise I'm willing to make.The 48-hour protection this deodorant offers is truly impressive. It keeps me feeling fresh and confident throughout the day, even during more strenuous activities. The invisible solid formula is a plus, leaving no white marks on clothing.Although the scent isn't my personal favorite, it's a minor trade-off considering the effectiveness of this antiperspirant. The peace of mind that comes with knowing I'm odor-free is invaluable, and I appreciate how well this product delivers on its promises.For anyone seeking a deodorant that works hard to keep body odor at bay, Mitchum Men's Antiperspirant Stick is an excellent choice. The scent might not be my top preference, but the benefits far outweigh this small drawback. It's a five-star product that I trust to keep me fresh and odor-free day after day!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works great! with overpowering smell!
reviews.reviewText: Its fully effective in preventing sweat and odor, especially coming from some cheap stuff prior. I only use a small amount, maybe one full swipe, and i'm good for the day.My gripe and the reason I won't purchase again though is the strong smell of manliness it puts out. I use it sparingly so I never smell it during the day when dressed, or have become nose blind to it, but I can't get it to fully wash off in the evenings. When lathering up, the deodorant feels like a massive dry spot in the shower that doesn't wash off, so I smell it all night since I mostly walk around shirtless. The smell is pervasive and musty, making me feel as if I'm overcompensating, like I need to go buy an F250 and jump on a skiploader.It works, well, and good for you if the scent works, but I'd love an unscented versionUpdate: I either became nose blind or the smell has subsided, so I'm thinking there's some inconsistency in manufacturing. Too much scent when I first got it and very low scent after the 1st mm of product was used. 4 stars if this plays out

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used this deodorant before, but for a while I was not able to buy it. It has a pleasant smell and lasts for quite a while. I'm a big guy, so weak deodorant does not work. This has lasted for 48 hours on occasions I was not able to wake up and take a shower. I used the white degree for a while, which is good, but Mitchum is certainly the best for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Hubby was having issues w his deodorants not working effectively and he is not a big sweater or anything - I have always used Mitchum for 20+ years I bought this for him and works great and does not yellow the armpits of shirts

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brand name at good price
reviews.reviewText: Works like it shouldArrived when it was supposed to

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband stunk really bad using another brand. We switched to this and said bye bye to unwanted body odors. It helps him to stay dry too!
This is the only deodorant that works for my teen boy and controls his B.O. Keeps him dry and fresh through the day.
Cumple su cometido 100 %, es eficiente, durable, no tan barato, pero lo vale, evita la transpiración y el mal olor
It's controls and almost prevents sweating and nice product for a long day use.

reviews.reviewTitle: Pleasant smelling and last so long.
reviews.reviewText: Actually it smells like a soap bar which I used as a child so nostalgic
I have used this product for years! I like the scent and it keeps me dry all day long. I signed up for the subscription option so I never run out again.
